original: dāridryārṇavaśoṣakaṁ trijagatāṁ śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇaḥ sāṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhirivānvayairavatatārāsmin mahīmaṇḍale || 269 ||
analyzed: dāridrya arṇava śoṣaka trijagatā śrī pṛthvi nārāyaṇaḥ sa aṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ iva anvayaiḥ avatatāra asmin mahī maṇḍale  /

original: (127) yadvattatsamaye suśāliyavagodhūmādisasyarddhayaḥ kaṁgūmāṣasatīnasarṣapatilekṣūṇāṁ mahāsampadaḥ |
analyzed: yadvat tad samaye su śāli yava godhūma ādi sasya ṛddhayaḥ kagū māṣa satīna sarṣapa tila ikṣūṇām mahā sampadaḥ

original: meghāḥ kālasuvarṣiṇaśca taravo gucchaiḥ prasūnaiḥ phalai- rāḍhyā bhūrirasapradāśca paśavaḥ santyatra janmotsave || 270 ||
analyzed: meghāḥ kāla suvarṣiṇaḥ ca taravaḥ gucchaiḥ prasūnaiḥ phalaiḥ rāḍhyāḥ bhūri rasa pradāḥ ca paśavaḥ santi atra janma utsave  /

original: gobhūhāṭakaratnadhāturajataṁ bhūyo'pi bhūyo'nvabhū- cchrīmatsiṁhapratāpasāhanṛpatau bhūmaṇḍalaṁ śāsati |
analyzed: go bhūhāṭaka ratna dhātu rajata bhūyas pi bhūyas nvabhū śrīmat siha pratāpa sāha nṛpatau bhū maṇḍala śāsati

original: kārpāsairbahulībhavajjagadidaṁ maryādayā modate tadvacchrīyuvarājajanmasudinaṁ sarvarddhibhavyārthadam || 271 ||
analyzed: kārpāsaiḥ bahulībhavat jagat idam maryādayā modate tadvat śrī yuvarāja janma su dina sarva ṛddhi bhavya artha dam

original: yadā chaunī vṛttā kṛtaruciracitrā hariharai- rnivāstavyā bhavyā prakṛtiparisevyā ca vibudhaiḥ |
analyzed: yadā śaunī vṛttā kṛta rucira citrā hari haraiḥ nivāstavyā bhavyā prakṛti parisevyā ca vibudhaiḥ

original: hayānāṁ hreṣābhirvijitaghananirhrādapaṭubhi- stadā kailāśādreḥ paribhavati tejāṁsi mahasā || 272 ||
analyzed: hayānāḥ hreṣābhiḥ vijita ghana nirhrāda paṭubhiḥ stadā kailāśa adreḥ paribhavati mahasā

original: (128) dhanādhīśo yakṣāpatirapi ca rājendranṛpate- rviditvā sadbhāvaṁ mumuca iti mānaṁ svamahasām |
analyzed: dhanādhīśaḥ yakṣā patiḥ api ca rāja indra nṛpateḥ rviditvā sadbhāva mumuce iti sva mahasām

original: jitaḥ kailāso me dhavalalayanairarddhaśaśibhiḥ sakhā me caitrādyaṁ vanamupavanaiścālakapurī || 273 ||
analyzed: jitaḥ kailāsaḥ me dhavala layanaiḥ arddhaśaśibhiḥ sakhā me caitra adya vanam upavanaiḥ ca alakapurī  /

original: (129) pumarthaiḥ prakhyātaiścaturupanataiḥ śrīraṇabahā- duraḥ smābhūd gorṣāpatiṣu paripūrṇaḥ kṣitipatiḥ |
analyzed: pumarthaiḥ prakhyātaiḥ catur upanataiḥ śrī raṇabahā duraḥ smā abhūt gorṣā patiṣu paripūrṇaḥ kṣitipatiḥ

original: tadanyūnāṁśena trijagati sa gīrvāṇanṛpati- stadṛddhyā pūrṇaśrīriha jagati rājendranṛpatiḥ || 274 ||
analyzed: tad anyūna āśena trijagati sa gīrvāṇa nṛpatiḥ stad ṛddhyā pūrṇa śrīḥ iha jagati rāja indra nṛpatiḥ

original: (130) sattvarddhyā bhrājamāno jayati narapatiḥ śrīmahārājarāje- ndro'yaṁ saṁpālyamāno lalitatripurasundaryadhiṣṭhātṛlakṣmyā |
analyzed: sattva ṛddhyā bhrājamānaḥ jayati narapatiḥ sa pālyamānaḥ lalita tripurasundarī adhiṣṭhātṛ lakṣmyā

original: thāpāhīreṇa bhīmena sa jaṭharakulenātigopāyiṁto'sau diṣṭyā jīvyānnarendraḥ śatamiha śaradāṁ śrīsurendreṇa sākam || 275 ||
analyzed: bhīmena sa jaṭhara kulena atigopāyitā asau diṣṭyā jīvyān narendraḥ śatam iha śaradā śrī surendreṇa sākam

original: āpārāvāragotrāpatiṣu parivṛḍhaśrīmahārājasāha- pṛthvīnārāyaṇānāṁ jitasakalajaganmallabhūmīpatīnām |
analyzed: āpārāvāra gotrā patiṣu jita sakala jagat malla bhūmīpatīnām

original: naptāraḥ pañcamāstepyaviratamavanīpālanāyāsakheda- dvandvairnirmuktacitāḥ samasukhanicitāḥ śrīsamṛddhā jayantu || 276 ||
analyzed: naptāraḥ pañcamāḥ te api aviratam avanī pālana āyāsa kheda dvandvaiḥ nirmukta citāḥ sama sukha nicitāḥ śrī samṛddhāḥ jayantu  /

original: saundarye madanaḥ prasannavadano nītyā prajārañjanaḥ śatrūṇāṁ śamanaḥ khalaudhadamano gīrvāṇahṛnnandanaḥ |
analyzed: saundarye madanaḥ prasanna vadanaḥ nītyā prajā rañjanaḥ śatrūṇā śamanaḥ khala odha damanaḥ gīrvāṇa hṛt nandanaḥ

original: śrīḍillīśvaravīrasenakalano dāridryavidhvaṁsano thāpābhīmabahādurārpitadhanaḥ śrīrājarājārjunaḥ || 277 ||
(131) pratāpajitabhāskaro vadanacandraśobhākaro mahīpatiguṇākaraḥ svajanasaṅghadattādaraḥ |
kavivyasanatāhara kṛtasapatnacittajvaraḥ aho raṇabahādurakṣitipatīndranapteśvaraḥ || 278 ||
analyzed: kavi vyasana tā hara kṛta sapatna citta jvaraḥ aho

original: pañcānāṁ jagatībhṛtāṁ puruṣaratnānāṁ samuccāraṇā- jjijñāsā bahuśo'nvakāri jinajenāryeṣu bhūbhṛtsu yā |
analyzed: pañcānā jagatībhṛtā puruṣa ratnānā samuccāraṇā jjijñāsā bahuśas nvakāri jinajena āryeṣu bhūbhṛtsu yā

original: taddāridryamahārṇavaprataraṇe naukeva me jāyatāṁ svastiśrīyuvarāḍayaṁ hi śatavarṣāyurvarīvartatām || 279 ||
analyzed: tad dāridrya mahā arṇava prataraṇe naukā iva me jāyatā svasti śrī yuvarāḍaya hi śata varṣa āyuḥ varīvartatām

original: (132) thāpāvaṁśāliratnāvaliṣu suruciraṁ hīrakaṁ bhīmasenaṁ yaṁ ca jyotsnottamāṅgaṁ tribhuvanavipaṇau sārthavāhairanardhyaṁ |
analyzed: su rucira ca ca jyotsnā uttamāṅga tribhuvana vipaṇau sārthavāhaiḥ anardhya

original: uddāmasthānavāmakramaviṣamamilatkūṭamānairabhedyaṁ puṇyaślokāvatāraṁ janaralasacivaṁ pāntu matsyendrakeśāḥ ||
analyzed: uddāma sthāna vāma krama viṣama milat kūṭa mānaiḥ abhedya puṇyaśloka avatāra jana rala saciva pāntu matsyendra keśāḥ

original: (133) kadācana purāpi no kṛtayugādijād bhūpateḥ svakīyapathamutsṛjannaṭati yātrayā'nyatra yaḥ |
analyzed: kadācana purā api no kṛta yuga ādi jāt bhūpateḥ svakīya patham utsṛjan aṭati yātrayā anyatra yaḥ

original: pracaṇḍaśivabhairavaḥ śikharisaṁjñapūrakṣakaḥ sa kāntipuramabhyayājjanasahasravismāpakaḥ || 280 ||
analyzed: pracaṇḍa śiva bhairavaḥ sa kāntipuram abhyayāt jana sahasra vismāpakaḥ

original: (134) yathāgatamajīgamaddhanumadādyakaṁ dvārakaṁ sa tatra pratihārakaiḥ sapadi kāñcu kīyādibhiḥ |
analyzed: yathāgatam ajīgamat hanumat ādyaka dvāraka sa tatra pratihārakaiḥ sapadi

original: dharāpativacomṛtaiḥ kṛtavicitrapūjāvidhi- rnabhasyasitadharmarāṭ-tithiśanau janairvāhitaḥ || 281 ||
analyzed: dharāpati vacaḥ mṛtaiḥ kṛta vicitra pūjā vidhiḥ rnabhasi asita dharma rāj tithi śanau janaiḥ vāhitaḥ  /

original: dvitīyayuvarājakaṁ pratilabhasva rājanniti pracaṇḍaśivabhairavo nivavṛte khagendro yathā |
analyzed: dvitīya yuvarājaka pratilabhasva rājan iti pracaṇḍa śiva bhairavaḥ nivavṛte khaga indraḥ yathā

analyzed: sarāka kuja pauṣa māsi aditime ca śuddha kṣaṇe dvitīya yuvarājakaḥ hi avatatāra sat lakṣaṇaḥ

original: svāmiśrīraṇabāhadūravacasā rājyāṅgadhūrdhāraṇād gīrvāṇāgrimayuddhavikramavibhorlabdhaprasādodayaḥ |
analyzed: rājya aṅga dhūḥ dhāraṇāt gīrvāṇa agrima yuddha vikrama vibhoḥ labdha prasāda udayaḥ

analyzed: yatra āste diśi rājarāja sacivaḥ śrī bhīmasena abhidhaḥ rājanvatyā abhidhā bhavat diś adhunā bokoṭa śaila sthalī  /

original: śivā rutamamūmucaṁstriṣu pureṣu śṛṅgāṭake pradīptadiśi saṁmukhāḥ sukaruṇāyamānā niśi |
analyzed: śivāḥ rutam amūmucaḥ triṣu pureṣu śṛṅgāṭake pradīpta diśi samukhāḥ su karuṇāyamānāḥ niśi

original: vasantasitapañcamībudhadine tvahirbudhnabhe tridhāṣṭavidhuje'bdake'niśamariṣṭasaṁsūcakam || 284 ||
analyzed: vasanta sita pañcamī budha dine tu ahirbudhnya bhe tridhā aṣṭa vidhu ja ibda keniśam ariṣṭa sa sūcakam

original: (135) mṛṣaughamiha nālikhaṁ hyananubhūtapūrvaṁ tathā bhaviṣyamapi yatkalau vividhapratyavāyaśruteḥ |
analyzed: mṛṣā ogham iha na ālikha hi ananubhūta pūrva tathā bhaviṣyam api yat kalau vividha pratyavāya śruteḥ

original: tadeva hi kulaṁ kulaṁ nṛpatipṛthvinārāyaṇa- kṣamājalanidhau plutaṁ śuci sadā'talasparśi yat || 285 ||
analyzed: tat eva hi kula kula nṛpati pṛthvi nārāyaṇa kṣamā jalanidhau pluta śuci sadā tala sparśi yat  /

original: tapovanamavīviśad raṇavahādurasvāminā- maputraracitāvṛṣī tribhavaduḥkhasaṁhāriṇī |
analyzed: tapovanam avīviśat raṇavaha ādura svāminā ma putra racitau ṛṣī tri bhava duḥkha sahāriṇī

original: maghau śravaṇame'site'ntakatithau vidhorvāsare lalit-tripurasundarī vasuvasudvipaike'bdake || 286 ||
analyzed: maghau śravaṇa mesitentaka tithau vidhoḥ vāsare lalit tripurasundarī vasu vasu dvipa eka ibdake  /

original: iti śrītriratnasaundaryagāthāyāṁ prakṛtiratnaṁ samāptam | (136)
analyzed: iti śrī triratnasaundaryagāthāyā prakṛti ratna samāptam
